title: Octave
description: Full featured audio visualization and processing app, built from the ground up with Rust and Slint. Includes Real Time Analyzer (RTA), live EQ, Spectrogram generation and more.

title: Vertent
description: Vertent is a BLDC-actuated haptic interface that uses "virtual detents" to provide infinitely variable scrolling resistance and tactile alerts. This project bridges the gap between precision and ergonomics through custom electronics and low-latency C++ firmware.

title: Mandelbrot Set Explorer
description: Full Stack ASP.NET Core application for rendering the Mandelbrot set. Capable of rendering images at any level of zoom, using arbitrary precision decimals
